question: 中学生
sourceMnemonic: You've seen <ja>学生</ja> (means student). Now let's look at a student who's in the middle. Perhaps we can call this a <vocabulary>middle school student</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>junior high school student</vocabulary>, depending on where you're from.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
